title: Fire TV/ Android TV  Login
custom_steps: WHEN they are on the login screen
custom_expected:
THEN they are presented static messaging
AND the background will contain their favorite team image
AND an empty email and password field
AND an eye button icon that is by default hiding the password
AND an inactive login button
AND a cancel button

title: Exit app modal
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user in the app

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I click the back button until I reach the point where I will exit the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I am presented with a modal with the Dialogue "Exit the app Do you want to exit the app?" and choices OK and Cancel

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I choose the Cancel option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I am returned to the page I was on before the modal was presented
THEN I am exited from the app

title: Express Login
custom_preconds: GIVEN a logged out user on the Login Screen
custom_steps:
WHEN the user uses the QR code to activate the login process on their mobile device
AND the user completes the login on their mobile device
custom_expected: THEN the user will be logged into the app

title: Attempt to create existing account username
custom_preconds: GIVEN a fresh install of the app
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the Create account page
AND the user enters an account with an existing user (release@party.com is an existing account)
AND the user enters a valid password
AND the user selects the Create account button
custom_expected:
THEN an "Account already exists. Please use a different email address or log in" error message is presented to the user
